sentences.sContent: These days, her bandanna is usually red.
sentences.sContent_eng: These days, her bandanna is usually red.
sentences.sCn: 这些天，她的印花大手帕通常是红色的。

sentences.sContent: The next morning, he bundled up some food in a red bandanna handkerchief, told his parents good-by, and set off into the world .
sentences.sContent_eng: The next morning, he bundled up some food in a red bandanna handkerchief, told his parents good-by, and set off into the world .
sentences.sCn: 次日早晨，他用一块红色的印花大手帕包了一些点心，告别了双亲，出发去闯天下。
